title: Guns and the Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/18
itunes:title: Guns and the Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/18
description:
George Noory and second amendment advocate Stewart Rhodes discuss "stand your ground" laws for self defense, and whether there will be a push to take guns away from the American public.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
